home.welcome: Welcome to Bath of Saint John
home.description: Discover the rich cultural tradition of Saint John's festivities in Brazil

communities.title: Communities and Festivities
communities.introduction: Learn about the communities that preserve and celebrate the traditions of the Bath of Saint John, especially in the South Mato Grosso Pantanal region. Each one maintains its own characteristics that enrich this cultural heritage.
communities.mapDescription: The markers on the map are approximate representations of communities that preserve and celebrate the traditions of the Bath of Saint John. They indicate the neighborhoods where these communities are present, not their exact locations. Click on a marker to learn more.
communities.noDescription: No description available for this community.
communities.noGallery: No additional images available for this community.

book.title: The Book of the Bath of Saint John
book.introduction: This digital book presents the rich tradition of the Bath of Saint John, covering its origins, rituals, symbolism, and cultural importance for the Pantanal communities.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.introduction: Learn about personal stories and experiences related to the Bath of Saint John through testimonials from participants, organizers, and researchers of this important cultural tradition.
testimonials.videoHelp: Maximum size: 50MB. Formats accepted: MP4, MOV, AVI
testimonials.successMessage: Thank you! Your testimonial will be reviewed and added soon.

postcards.title: Postcards from the Bath of Saint John
postcards.introduction: Explore this collection of images that depict various aspects of the Bath of Saint John celebration in the Pantanal. Share or download postcards to remember and spread this rich cultural tradition.
